summary: Female Orc Follower; No DLC required
descriptionHtml:
NO DLC REQUIRED!!!!

Lish is a wandering warrior from High Rock who recently took work in the Silver Blood mine to pony up some coin to pay for new equipment. Then you walked in ... ;

one handed weapons, two handed weapons, block, archery, and heavy armor are her strengths.

light armor is her lesser attribute

Combat style is very high offense.

Perks: Savage Strike, Hack n' Slash, Devastating Blow, Limb Splitter, Elemental Protection, Deadly Bash, Unhindered, Conditioning.

***Lish likes her axes
__________________________________________________

She is fairly powerful, but balanced. I played with her extensively up to level 30 and she has saved my skin more times than I can count. So, I wanted you to see her skills.

Set as essential, can be turned off in the console command if you wish.

Max level = 81

She can be found eating and drinking and being herself in the Silver Blood Inn in Markarth.

###NOTE###

Sometimes when you recruit her she will turn into a BRO and start partying. Just exit the Inn, then go back in. She should follow you without a hitch now.

__________________________________________________
INSTALLATION

Simply drag the contents of this folder into your Skyrim Data folder.

If you can ignore the heavy handed behavior, Orc women can make you really happy.

__________________________________________________

Thanks, and have a grand adventure with this tough, bloodthirsty, dependable, life-saving and surprisingly beautiful orc woman.
author: DaveEscape
